name: 58 mm Omnidirectional Wheel Chassis
description: The Mecanum wheel from Nexus Robotics is comprised of 12 nylon rollers mounted between two aluminium alloy plates so that their axis of rotation is 45° to the axis of the main wheel.

name: Gooseneck™ Robotics Chassis
description: The Gooseneck™ Robotics Chassis by ServoCity is a small chassis equipped with two skate wheels and two 195 rpm HD planetary gear motors. It moves easily and quickly over the ground

name: 60mm aluminium right mecanum wheel
description: The 60mm aluminium mecanum wheel consists of 8 rubbers rollers, the axles and rollers are placed between two aluminiums plates. Equipped with these wheels, your robot will be able to move forwards and backwards

name: Tin Solder (100 g spool)
description: This 1.0 mm diameter, 60% tin-40% lead solder has a water-soluble resin core. It's a good spool for more advanced users that should last 6 months minimum.

name: Mini Soldering Iron
description: This Seeed Studio Mini Soldering Iron is probably one of the most practical currently on the market. It’s both lightweight and portable, and you can accurately control its temperature

name: Seeed Studio Mini Soldering Iron Stand
description: Small and portable, this stand was designed especially to go with the Seeed Studio Mini Soldering Iron. It even includes a small sponge that can help you clean your soldering iron.

name: Set of 8 precision screwdrivers - Microtip
description: These screwdrivers have a special handle with swivel cap, a black tip and are made of chrome-molybdenum vanadium steel.

name: Shadow Robotics Chassis
description: The SparkFun RedBot Basic kit offers the ideal combination: a programming board compatible with the Arduino environment and an ABS plastic robotics chassis capable of accommodating a multitude of sensors.

name: Nexus Robotics Ltd - Aluminium
description: It advocates the importance of financial literacy, independence.

name: 60mm aluminium right mecanum wheel
description: The 60mm aluminium mecanum wheel consists of 8 rubbers rollers, the axles and rollers are placed between two aluminiums plates. Equipped with these wheels, your robot will be able to move forwards and backwards
